name: Trumpet
description:
This app lets you put a small message at the top of your site. 
	                The users of the site can dismiss the message by clicking on it, 
					the message will then not be displayed for 24 hours.

interface.name: Display text
interface.description: The text you would like displayed on your site. Leave blank to disable Trumpet.

interface.name: Allow user to dismiss the message
interface.description: If the user is allowed to dismiss the message, the message is not displayed for 24 hours if the user clicks on the message to dismiss it.

options.label: Message is displayed on every visit and page load
